title: Highest Electric Power Losses
description: In 2022, Iraq experienced electric power transmission and distribution losses amounting to 59.25% of output, one of the highest in the world.

title: Lowest Female Employment Ratio
description: In 2021, the employment to population ratio for females aged 15-24 in Iraq was only 2.58%, one of the lowest globally.

title: Highest Fuel Export Dependency
description: In 2016, 99.99% of Iraq's merchandise exports were fuel, indicating a very high dependency on fuel exports.

title: Lowest Use of Banks for Investment
description: In 2022, only 0.9% of firms in Iraq used banks to finance investments, one of the lowest rates worldwide.

title: Lowest Female Labor Force Participation
description: In 2021, the labor force participation rate for females aged 15+ in Iraq was 10.77%, among the lowest in the world.
